data.title: ‘Bigg Boss 18’ will premiere this October! Salman Khan returns as host
data.meta_description: As reported by NDTV, Bigg Boss 18 is anticipated to premiere on October 4, 2024. While the official contestant lineup hasn't been announced yet, rumors are already making the rounds. In a YouTube video, Payal Malik, a previous participant on Bigg Boss OTT 3, revealed that her husband Armaan Malik's second wife, Kritika Malik, has been contacted to join the show.
data.text:
Synopsis

As reported by NDTV, Bigg Boss 18 is anticipated to premiere on October 4, 2024. While the official contestant lineup hasn't been announced yet, rumors are already making the rounds. In a YouTube video, Payal Malik, a previous participant on Bigg Boss OTT 3, revealed that her husband Armaan Malik's second wife, Kritika Malik, has been contacted to join the show.

The 18th season of ‘Bigg Boss’ is set to premiere in October 2024, following the conclusion of ‘Bigg Boss OTT 3’.

Fans are eagerly awaiting official updates on the premiere date, contestant lineup, and other details for the main season. Reports suggest that Bigg Boss 18 will air on Colors TV later this year, with Salman Khan returning as the host.

According to a report by NDTV, the show is expected to debut on October 4, 2024. Although the contestant list has yet to be confirmed, rumors are already circulating. Payal Malik, a former contestant on ‘Bigg Boss OTT 3’, mentioned in a YouTube video that her husband Armaan Malik's second wife, Kritika Malik, has been approached to join the show.

Several names are being speculated as potential contestants for Bigg Boss 18, including actors Gurucharan Singh, Arjun Bijlani, Sameera Reddy, Pooja Sharma, Dalljiet Kaur, Shiney Ahuja, and Karan Patel.

Additionally, well-known social media influencers like Mr. Faisu, Dolly Chaiwala, Maxtern, Abhishek Malhan, and Thugesh are rumored to be participating. Contestants from Splitsvilla 15, such as Digvijay Rathee, Unnati Tomar, Siwet Tomar, Kashish Kapoor, and Akriti Negi, are also speculated to be part of the Bigg Boss 18 cast.

Meanwhile, actor Sana Makbul emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss OTT 3, with rapper Naezy as the first runner-up and Ranvir Shorey as the second runner-up. The show was hosted by actor Anil Kapoor.

(Catch all the Business News, Breaking News, Budget 2024 Events and Latest News Updates on The Economic Times.)
